title: raritycheck
author: raritycheck
content: TIME LEFT: END TIME: 11/05/2023 01:00 AM NYCLIMITED EDITION - 2022 RC Lost Coin Series  sets    https://kollektra.com/collectible/rchluzhttps://kollektra.com/collectible/rchlusBack of the coins look like this (for both silver and alloy). More info about coins:SilverMetal: .999 Fine Pure Silver Diameter: 34.9mm    Weight: 24 grams   (0.85 Oz)Diameter: 34.9 mm Engraved serial number: No Quantity: Limited to 100 Alloy:Material: Zinc AlloyPlating:  Silver Finish: ProofDiameter 34.9 mm Engraved serial number: NoQuantity: Limited to 200There are three lots:Lot 1- Pair of silver and alloy  Lot 2- Pair of silver and alloy  Lot 3- Pair of silver and alloy    For each lot, starting bid: 0.003BTC    MINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.001 BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places** **Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 10 minutes will extend the auction 10 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 10 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 10 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING
